meta.title: Indiana Online School for K-12 | IN Connections Academy

meta.name: DESCRIPTION
meta.content: Indiana Connections Academy is a tuition-free, full-time K-12 online public school for students in Indiana. Enroll today!

a.title: For enrollment help, call us now at 1-800-382-6010

br.p: This website is not compatible with Internet Explorer 8 or below. Please upgrade to the latest version here. This link will open in a new window.

header.h1: K-12 Online Public School in Indiana!

div.p: Indiana Connections Academy is an accredited online public school for students in grades K-12— and so much more. We’re a tight-knit school community providing an award-winning curriculum, caring teachers, and opportunities for parent involvement. Explore our school!

Ready to go? Start your online
registration now!

h3.a: Important information about COVID-19 for enrolled families

br.p: Students throughout Indiana are thriving at Indiana Connections Academy (INCA), a tuition-free online public school. INCA gives students the flexibility to learn at home with a curriculum that meets rigorous state education standards.

div.p: Events are great ways to learn more

div.blockquote: "I am very grateful for the flexibility that my teachers at INCA provided me. I was able to get the help that I need, in the way that I learn best."

img.alt: Anna smiling with her hands on her hips

div.blockquote: "It’s great to have the flexibility that INCA allows to enjoy school and incorporate school lessons into the family lifestyle, and vice versa."

img.alt: Arjun sitting on a deck outside

div.blockquote: "Everyone should explore their own possibilities, and INCA helps me to explore mine."
"The best part about INCA for us was the amount of quality family time that we were able to have."

div.p: INCA Executive Director Chandre Sanchez Reyes advises families new to online learning
Wendy Tannberger to audition for "America's Got Talent"

ul.li: Indiana Connections Academy (INCA) is a K–12 charter school serving students throughout Indiana.
Teaching center and administrative office in Indianapolis.
Indiana Connections Academy is accredited by the North Central Association Commission on Accreditation and School Improvement (NCA CASI), an accrediting division of Cognia, formerly AdvancED.
Nearly 95% of INCA parents agree that the Connections Academy curriculum is high quality. View our parent survey results.
Download the School Profile for Indiana Connections Academy
